document_data.name: Lathtolt
document_data.mainbody: '''Lathtolt''' was a long-lived [[mage]] of [[Tashluta]] and the record-holder for the most attempts at becoming the [[Magister]] by the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: His defensive spells were excellent, though he relied on them overmuch while dueling. He was also able to brew a ''[[potion of longevity]]'' or a magical bath of his own devising that accomplished a similar effect.
document_data.History: He was over 800 years old, and had challenged the Magister a total of 42 times in that time, as of {{yearlink|1370}}.
document_data.Personality: By then, he had recently admitted he had no more interest in becoming the Magister.
